terms.description: Jupiter is a comprehensive DeFi platform on Solana, renowned for its swap aggregator and essential DeFi infrastructure.
JUP is the native token of the Jupiter ecosystem, used for governance and rewards.
The Jupiverse encompasses the entire Jupiter ecosystem, including its products, community, and governance.
Jupuary was a promotional period in January associated with Jupiter initiatives, potentially including the JUP token airdrop.
Jup&Juice is a community podcast (Working group) that discusses developments within the Jupiter and broader Solana ecosystem. Members: Wake, Sax, Irish, Monique.
Catdets are active and engaged members of the Jupiter community who contribute to the ecosystem.
Cats of Culture are recognized cultural leaders within the Jupiter community, driving community efforts.
J4J represents a spirit of mutual support within the Jupiter community, fostering growth and success.
PPP is a J4J-inspired ethos emphasizing support among Catdets within the Jupiter ecosystem.
Planetary Calls are regular live events where Jupiter shares strategies, updates, and plans with the community.
Catstanbul was a Jupiter community event held in Istanbul, bringing members together.
JupSOL is Jupiterâ€™s liquid staking token (LST) representing SOL staked to the Jupiter validator, which earns staking yields and MEV kickbacks.
JLP is the token representing liquidity within Jupiter's perpetuals trading, allowing holders to earn fees from leveraged trades.
Dollar Cost Averaging is an investment strategy of regularly purchasing assets regardless of price.
A Decentralized Exchange is a platform for trading cryptocurrencies without a central authority.
A Limit Order is an order to buy or sell an asset at a specified price.
Swapping refers to exchanging one cryptocurrency for another.
Ape Pro/Trenches is Jupiter's memecoin terminal, offering pro-performance trading with mobile optimization, social logins, and advanced data.
JupTrenches is Jupiter's advanced trading platform, designed for seamless memecoin trading with low fees, real-time data, and enhanced user experience.
A Memecoin is a cryptocurrency created based on internet memes or jokes.
The LFG Launchpad was Jupiter's platform for launching new projects on Solana, with V2 updates coming.
Perps refers to perpetual futures contracts trading on Jupiter, allowing leveraged speculation.
Staking $JUP allows users to participate in governance and earn Active Staking Rewards (ASR) by voting on proposals.
The Jupiter DAO empowers $JUP holders to shape the platform's future through governance and voting on key proposals.
Uplink WG amplifies Jupiter's core narratives and fosters community growth through content creation and communication. (Hosts Planetary Calls), Key Members: Kash, OrganizedGeneral, Molu, Will
The Core Working Group (CWG) guides the governance processes and operational strategies of the Jupiter ecosystem.
The Catdet Working Group (CAWG) fosters community engagement and culture within Jupiter by supporting Catdets and promoting initiatives.
SpaceStation is Jupiter's comprehensive documentation hub, offering resources for users and developers to navigate the ecosystem.
Dev.jup.ag is the developer portal for the Jupiter ecosystem, providing resources, APIs, and documentation for integrating with Jupiter's services.
Jupiverse.zendesk.com is the support portal for the Jupiter community, offering FAQs, guides, and assistance for users.
JupResearch is a collaborative research platform within the Jupiter ecosystem, facilitating discussions, proposals, and insights from the community.
The Giant Unified Market (GUM) is Jupiter's initiative to integrate diverse asset classes and unify liquidity across Solana, enhancing accessibility and trading efficiency.
Metropolis is a significant upgrade for Jupiter, enhancing liquidity integration, trading efficiency, and user experience across the ecosystem.
Office Hours are regular community calls hosted by the Core Working Group, providing updates, discussions, and Q&A sessions to engage with the community.
Jup.ag is Jupiter's main website address for the swap platform.
Solana is the high-performance blockchain that Jupiter is built on.
USDC is a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar, commonly used on Jupiter.
USDT is a stablecoin pegged to the US dollar, commonly used on Jupiter.
BONK is a popular Solana-based memecoin that trades on Jupiter.
SOL is the native token of the Solana blockchain.
Web3 is the next generation of internet based on blockchain technology.
DeFi refers to financial applications built on blockchain technology.
Layer 1 refers to base blockchain protocols like Solana.
Layer 2 refers to scaling solutions built on top of base blockchains.
Jup.eco is Jupiter's dedicated ecosystem platform, serving as a hub for community resources, governance information, and project updates.
Jup Mobile is Jupiter's mobile application.
Jup DAO is Jupiter's decentralized autonomous organization for governance.
Terminal is a developer-friendly interface for integrating Jupiter's APIs, enabling seamless access to trading functionalities and liquidity.
Tokenomics refers to the economic model and distribution of the JUP token.
NFTs are unique digital assets that can be traded on blockchain.
Active Staking Rewards (ASR) are incentives for $JUP holders who actively participate in governance by voting on proposals, enhancing community engagement.
Farming involves providing liquidity to earn rewards in DeFi protocols.
Yield refers to returns earned from DeFi activities like staking or farming.
An Airdrop is a free distribution of tokens to wallet addresses.
Catdet&CoC represents the combined community roles of Catdets and Cats of Culture.
A Liquidity Pool is a collection of funds locked in a smart contract for trading.
Jupiter Perpetuals Exchange is Jupiter's platform for trading perpetual futures contracts.
"Wen" is crypto slang for 'when', often used to inquire about release dates.
Vote.jup.ag is Jupiter's governance voting platform, enabling $JUP holders to participate in decision-making by voting on proposals and initiatives.
Jupiter Horizon is an AI-driven assistant and content hub designed to provide users with instant access to information, updates, and resources within the Jupiter ecosystem.
JUPreddit is the Jupiter community on Reddit.
JupNet is Jupiter's omnichain network aimed at aggregating liquidity and enabling seamless interactions across multiple blockchains within the ecosystem.
Value Averaging (VA) is an investment strategy that dynamically adjusts investment amounts based on market performance, aiming to optimize portfolio growth over time.
JupLock is a transparent token locking mechanism designed for projects within the Solana ecosystem, allowing teams to securely lock their tokens and manage vesting schedules.
Edge Site is Jupiter's experimental platform for testing cutting-edge features and enhancements before they are launched on the main site, aimed at improving user experience and functionality.

Claimpad is a Jupiter platform that facilitates the distribution of tokens to a large number of users, providing a secure and reliable way to claim airdrops. It leverages Jupiter's infrastructure to ensure smooth and scalable token distribution for top Solana projects.
C.A.T. (Certainty, Alignment, Transparency) is a Jupiter initiative focused on building trust through clear token distribution, stakeholder alignment, and transparency in decision-making.

RFQ (Request For Quote) is a feature on Jupiter that allows users to swap tokens with zero slippage and no gas fees by sourcing off-chain liquidity from market makers. It provides a way to execute trades, especially on Edge, with potentially better prices by comparing on-chain and off-chain liquidity.

acronyms: Decentralized Oracles that Validate and Execute
terms.description: DOVEs (Decentralized Oracles that Validate and Execute) are a proposed decentralized system within the Jupiter ecosystem designed to reach consensus on external events, internal state changes, and the execution of external transactions. They are a key component of Jupnet, aiming to aggregate all of crypto into a single decentralized ledger.

The Global Decentralized Stock Exchange (GDSE) is Jupiter's vision to become a comprehensive platform where various assets, including real-world assets (RWAs), crypto, stocks, and commodities, can be seamlessly traded. It represents Jupiter's ambition to disrupt traditional finance by bringing off-chain companies and assets on-chain.
